title: Carlos Infante
text:
Carlos Jesús Infante Figueroa (born 14 February 1982) is a former <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender.
Career.
Infante made his professional debut in a game against <a href="Club%20Le%C3%B3n">Club León</a> on 25 February 2001. The game ended with América and León tying at 1. Though Infante was used regularly as a substitute, América loaned him out to <a href="UANL%20Tigres">UANL Tigres</a> prior to the Clausura 2004 season. Appearing only in 2 games as a substitute that season, Infante was loaned out again, this time to <a href="CD%20Veracruz">CD Veracruz</a>. After a brief spell there, Infante returned to Club América, where he remains until he was dealt to Necaxa for the Clausura 2009 season.
